# Detect Poison (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 1]], [[0 Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 0]], [[0 Level Druid Spells|Druid 0]], [[1st Level Elven Archer Spells|Elven archer 1]], [[1st Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]], [[0 Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 0]], [[0 Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 0]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target or Area:** One creature, one object, or a 5-ft. cube

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 268

You determine whether a creature, object, or area has been poisoned or is poisonous. You can determine the exact type of poison with a DC 20 Wisdom check. A character with the [[Craft (Skill)|Craft]] (alchemy) skill may try a DC 20 [[Craft (Skill)|Craft]] (alchemy) check if the Wisdom check fails, or may try the [[Craft (Skill)|Craft]] (alchemy) check prior to the Wisdom check. The spell can penetrate barriers, but 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt blocks it.

**GM Note** 

*House Rule:* Added Assassin 1 to Level per *Dungeon Master's Guide*.

                       Added Elven archer 1 to Level per New Paths Compendium (Kobold Press), pg. 20.
